media:group.media:description:

The teaching method in this video is adapted to fit an online learning model. This particular lesson is designed for Novice Level (A1). Through storytelling, as well as "storyasking," you will practice speaking Spanish and respond to questions in the target language about an imaginary character.

Spanish CI (Comprehensible Input) and TPRS (Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling) are effective and engaging ways to learn a language. If you enjoy this approach to language acquisition, subscribe to my channel and share with your language-loving friends for more TPRS and Comprehensible Input videos to come!
